lead_paragraph: Adam Wainwright (11-9) gave up two hits in seven scoreless innings and Yadier Molina put on a rare power display with two homers as the St. Louis Cardinals defeated the host Milwaukee Brewers, 8-0, yesterday to complete a crucial three-game sweep.
snippet: Adam Wainwright (11-9) gave up two hits in seven scoreless innings and Yadier Molina put on a rare power display with two homers as the St. Louis Cardinals defeated the host Milwaukee Brewers, 8-0, yesterday to complete a crucial three-game sweep.
